name: Urvi Chana
text: The story was so original and refreshing.

name: Stuvan Varty
text: The movie was a true cinematic triumph. Every scene was beautifully shot.

name: Purab Atwal
text: I was completely immersed in the story. I was smiling the whole way through. The movie was a revelation.

name: Ryan Badal
text: I couldn't tear my eyes away from the screen. The movie was a true delight from start to finish. The movie was an absolute delight from start to finish.

name: Rohan Karan
text: I was left in awe of the sheer brilliance of it all. I can't wait to watch it again!

name: Biju Sur
text: I loved every minute of it. I can't wait to see it again. I was completely blown away by the sheer talent on display.
